author: Staff Reporter
text:
Tense moments prevailed at Narasimhanaickenpalayam, near Periyanaickenpalayam, on Sunday after devotees were agitated over the damage caused to a Vinayaka idol in that place. Hindu Munnani cadre resorted to a road blockade seeking arrest of the accused.

While it was initially suspected to be the work of some anti-social elements for disturbing communal harmony, the police later came to know that it was an act of a mentally-affected man of the same locality.
title: HM cadre stage protest
